backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact messages in a list, allowing submissions with validation and retrieval via a query method.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for deployment evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence descriptions for various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Markdown checklist outlining steps and diagnostics for validating backend and frontend deployment flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress via Elementor, including setup and limitations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing overlays, scene startup state, diagnostics, error handling, and rendering the 3D scene within a canvas.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Reusable frame component applying contour background texture and styled container around child content.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Structured panel wrapper with title bar, close button, scroll area, and ContourFrame styling.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers onboarding or controls overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo and buttons to open menu, about, contact, and export panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: A dialog overlay that introduces users to basic 3D navigation and interaction tips with a dismiss button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Tracks whether onboarding has been dismissed using localStorage and provides functions to update the flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages using the backend actor with validation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles defining Tailwind layers, custom color variables, fonts, theming, and reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: A right-side sheet showing information about the cafe, its mission, values, and location.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: A contact form sheet allowing users to submit messages and view contact details using query and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Slide‑out panel providing instructions and a download link for a WordPress‑ready static package, plus notes on limitations and setup.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Slide‑out menu panel with tabbed categories (coffee, pastries, desserts) and a MenuItem component displaying item details.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Main 3D scene combining fallback geometry, environment loading, physics, and interactions with error logging and navigation support.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Custom hook enabling WASD and mouse‑driven first‑person navigation with pointer‑lock and drag‑to‑look support.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Lightweight fallback 3D room with floor and walls rendered immediately without dependencies.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Full café environment with textured floor, walls, furniture, physics plane, and a mount callback for readiness.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines 3D cafe furniture components (counter, table, chair, stool) using meshes and optional wood texture.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative cafe objects like espresso machine, grinder, display case, and cups using a loaded texture.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: React hook that loads a texture asynchronously, logging errors and leaving undefined on failure.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Watchdog hook that triggers a timeout callback if a scene fails to render within a set duration.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Automatically opens and closes a door mesh based on camera proximity with smooth rotation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Interactive prop that can be dragged to rotate and shows an on-screen hint while inspecting.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Composes all interaction systems, wiring POIs, proximity zones, door control, and props to UI activation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Displays a floating interactive prop (card, cup, or sign) with hover animations and click handling.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Handles point‑of‑interest markers with hover, dwell detection, animations, and panel activation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Defines a list of points of interest with positions, labels, and actions for scene interaction.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects camera entry into defined zones and shows UI prompts to trigger associated panels.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Renders interactive panel props in the 3D scene that trigger different UI panels when clicked.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Provides helper functions to create Three.js materials and defines preset contour colors.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that reports scene errors and resets when children change.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Displays an overlay warning that only a basic scene loaded and offers a retry button.
Shows an error overlay for scene load failures with optional diagnostic details and retry support.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Renders a loading overlay with a spinner and status text while the scene initializes.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Implements diagnostic logging for scene load stages, failures, and success events.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL compatibility and required extensions, returning support status and reasons.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI panel is active in the scene overlay.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion timing, easing, spring presets, and a helper to generate transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Holds design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Provides utilities for logging deployment-related errors with remediation hints and wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks the 3D cafe project’s current state, including features, issues, and architectural notes for building an interactive contour-themed environment. Indicates recent deployment failures and missing 3D scene assets, marking the file as a fix request.
